headline.main: KOREAN LEADER HAILS INDEPENDENCE PLEDGE; Haan Says 'Plenty of Fireworks' Will Result in Orient

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 1 (AP) -- The Allied pledge to restore Korea's independence was hailed with enthusiasm by the Sino-Korean Peoples League today, a spokesman asserting it would touch off "plenty of fireworks" behind Japan's strategic areas.
abstract: K K Haan, Wash repr, hails United Nations Cairo conf pledge of Korean freedom
snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 1 (AP) -- The Allied pledge to restore Korea's independence was hailed with enthusiasm by the Sino-Korean Peoples League today, a spokesman asserting it would touch off "plenty of fireworks" behind Japan's strategic areas....
